text: Juan Angel Calzado de Castro (born March 16, 1937) is a former field hockey player from Spain, who captured the bronze medal with the Men's National Team at the 1960 Summer Olympics in Rome, Italy. Later on, he became the president of the International Hockey Federation (FIH). ==References== Category:1937 births Category:Living people Category:Spanish male field hockey players Category:Olympic field hockey players of Spain Category:Field hockey players at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:Field hockey players at the 1964 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Spain Category:Olympic medalists in field hockey Category:Medalists at the 1960 Summer Olympics
title: Juan Calzado
